mapper.select: select max(m.move_number) as move_number, max(cm.move_order) as move_order, g.game_id, g.game_label from ag_competitors c, ag_competitor_moves cm, ag_moves m, ag_games g WHERE c.competitor_id = cm.competitor_id and cm.move_id = m.move_id and m.game_id = g.game_id and g.game_status_id = 1 group by 3 order by 3, 1, 2;

SELECT g.game_id, last_move.move_number AS last_move_number, last_move.move_order AS last_move_order, last_move.finished_time, sp.share_id, sp.price FROM ag_games g JOIN gv_game_variants gv ON g.game_variant_id = gv.game_variant_id LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cm1.competitor_move_id, m1.game_id, cm1.move_order, cm1.finished_time, m1.move_number FROM ag_competitor_moves cm1, (SELECT m.move_id, move_number, game_id FROM ag_moves m WHERE m.game_id IN #{item} AND move_number IN (SELECT max(move_number) FROM ag_moves WHERE game_id = m.game_id)) m1 WHERE m1.move_id = cm1.move_id AND cm1.move_order = (SELECT max(cm2.move_order) FROM ag_competitor_moves cm2 WHERE cm2.move_id = m1.move_id)) AS last_move JOIN ag_move_steps ms ON ms.competitor_move_id = last_move.competitor_move_id JOIN ag_share_prices sp ON sp.step_id = ms.step_id ON last_move.game_id = g.game_id WHERE g.game_id IN #{item}
